item.title: 欧盟财长将讨论关税对经济的影响
item.description: 欧盟财长会议主席安杰伊-多曼斯基（Andrzej Domanski）在一封邀请信中写道，欧盟财长将于周五讨论如何应对美国对欧盟商品征收关税对欧洲经济增长的预期打击。【原文：European Union finance ministers will discuss on Friday how to tackle the expected blow to Europe's economic growth from tariffs imposed by the United States on EU goods, the chairman of the meeting Andrzej Domanski wrote in an invitation letter.】

item.title: 受汽车关税影响，大众汽车旗下奥迪汽车在美国港口滞留
item.description: 大众汽车公司的奥迪发言人周二表示，由于新征收的25%的汽车关税，该公司将扣留4月2日之后运抵美国港口的汽车，这证实了美国贸易刊物《汽车新闻》（Automotive News）报道的一份发给经销商的备忘录的内容。【原文：Volkswagen's Audi is holding back cars that arrived in U.S. ports after April 2 because of the newly imposed 25% autos tariff, a spokesperson said on Tuesday, confirming the contents of a memo sent to dealers and reported on by U.S. trade publication Automotive News.】

item.title: 全球银行监管集团任命英国央行行长贝利为下任主席
item.description: 由全球金融监管机构组成的金融稳定委员会周一表示，已提名英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）担任下一任主席，任期三年，从今年 7 月开始。【原文：The Financial Stability Board, a group comprising financial regulators around the world, said on Monday it had nominated Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey as its next chair for a three-year term starting in July.】

item.title: 特朗普坚定关税立场，多伦多证券交易所期货创八个月新低
item.description: 加拿大股指期货周一暴跌，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）没有表现出放弃其全面关税计划的迹象，这加剧了人们对经济衰退的担忧，给全球市场带来了冲击波。【原文：Canadian stock index futures tumbled on Monday, as recession fears intensified after U.S. President Donald Trump showed no sign of backing away from his sweeping tariff plans, sending shockwaves through global markets.】

item.title: 早间竞价股市再次暴跌，没有 "如果 "或 "看跌
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的关键所在。【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today.】

item.title: 一切都如此昂贵"：玻利维亚人勒紧裤腰带应对新的通货膨胀现实
item.description: 在玻利维亚的高原城市拉巴斯，家庭主妇安吉丽卡-萨帕塔（Angelica Zapata）正在接受新的通货膨胀现实，因为在安第斯国家燃料和美元短缺的推动下，物价以近二十年来最快的速度上涨。【原文：In Bolivia's highland city La Paz, homemaker Angelica Zapata is coming to terms with a new inflation reality as prices rise at the fastest speed in almost two decades, propelled by shortages of fuel and dollars in the Andean country.】

item.title: 乌克兰希望在本周会谈中就矿产交易与美国 "保持一致
item.description: 乌克兰副总理周一表示，乌克兰将于本周派遣一个小组前往华盛顿，就美国提出的更广泛的矿产协议草案进行谈判。【原文：Ukraine will send a team to Washington this week to move forward with negotiations on a more expansive draft for a minerals deal offered by the United States, the deputy prime minister said on Monday.】

item.title: 受关税冲击影响，花旗下调 0-3 个月布伦特原油预期至 60 美元/桶
item.description: 花旗研究公司周一将 0-3 个月布伦特价格预期下调至每桶 60 美元，并将 0-3 个月铜和铝价格预期分别下调至每吨 8,000 美元和每吨 2,200 美元，原因是最新宣布的关税。【原文：Citi Research on Monday lowered its 0-3 month Brent price forecast to $60 per barrel and also reduced its 0-3 month copper and aluminium price forecasts to $8,000 per metric ton and $2,200 per ton, respectively due to the latest tariff announcements.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会主席与汽车、钢铁和制药业高管讨论美国关税对策
item.description: 消息人士和一封信显示，欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩周一与金属行业代表举行了一次电话会议，并在稍后与汽车行业进行了交谈，讨论如何应对美国的关税。【原文：European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen held a call with metals industry representatives on Monday and was speaking to the automobile sector later to discuss how to respond to U.S. tariffs, sources and a letter showed.】

item.title: 法庭确认苹果公司对英国 "后门 "命令提出上诉
item.description: 英国调查权法庭（IPT）周一证实，苹果公司正在就英国政府要求其为加密云存储系统创建 "后门 "的命令提起上诉。【原文：Apple is appealing against a British government order to create a "back door" to its encrypted cloud storage systems, the Investigatory Powers Tribunal (IPT) confirmed on Monday.】

item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官戴蒙警告说，关税可能会减缓美国经济增长，加剧通货膨胀
item.description: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙告诫投资者，美国关税和全球贸易战引发的动荡可能会减缓世界最大经济体的增长，刺激通货膨胀，并可能导致持久的负面影响。【原文：JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon cautioned investors that the turmoil caused by U.S. tariffs and a global trade war could slow growth in the world's largest economy, spur inflation and potentially lead to lasting negative consequences.】

item.title: 本田执行副总裁青山因 "不当行为指控 "辞职
item.description: 本田汽车周一表示，公司已接受执行副总裁青山真治的辞呈，青山真治被指控在工作时间以外的社交聚会上有不当行为。【原文：Honda Motor said on Monday that it had accepted the resignation of Executive Vice President Shinji Aoyama which followed an allegation of inappropriate conduct during a social gathering outside of work hours.】

item.title: 欧洲股市 2025 年开门红熄灭，关税为第一季度盈利蒙上阴影
item.description: 欧洲股市在2025年的开局表现令人印象深刻，但在三个交易日中遭到大量抛售，而高管们则在合计美国关税对供应链的潜在影响，这可能迫使他们放弃之前的财务预测。【原文：European equities' impressive start to 2025 has been obliterated in three sessions of heavy selling, while executives tot up the potential impact of U.S. tariffs on supply chains, possibly forcing them to ditch previous financial predictions.】

item.title: 巴克莱再次下调 STOXX 600 目标，称危机使预测变得模糊不清
item.description: 巴克莱银行周一在不到一个月的时间里第二次下调了欧洲STOXX 600指数的年底目标，原因是贸易紧张局势升级和美国关税加剧了市场对经济衰退的担忧。【原文：Barclays on Monday cut its year-end target for Europe’s STOXX 600 index for the second time in under a month as escalating trade tensions and U.S. tariffs fueled recession fears.】

item.title: 独家报道智利启动锂计划，原住民要求更多控制权
item.description: 智利锂资源丰富的阿塔卡马沙漠地区的原住民社区正在与智利最大的两家矿业公司进行谈判，据这两家公司和社区消息来源称，他们希望在增加电池金属开采量的计划中获得更多影响力。【原文：Chile's Indigenous communities in the lithium-rich Atacama Desert are in talks with two of the nation's biggest miners to gain more influence over plans to increase extraction of the battery metal, according to the companies and community sources.】

item.title: 英国 JD Sports 因美国市场而跑输大盘
item.description: 英国运动服装零售商 JD Sports Fashion 的股价在周一的股市大跌中表现不佳，这反映了该公司对主要合作伙伴耐克的严重依赖和美国关税的影响。【原文：Shares in British sportswear retailer JD Sports Fashion underperformed a stock market rout on Monday, reflecting both its heavy exposure to key partner Nike and U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 阿根廷 "僵尸 "抵押贷款市场重现生机
item.description: 阿根廷的抵押贷款市场多年来由于三位数的通货膨胀率和高借贷成本而几乎不存在，但在自由主义者哈维尔-米莱伊总统的亲市场改革下，阿根廷的抵押贷款市场开始出现恢复活力的迹象。【原文：Argentina's mortgage market, for years almost non-existent due to spiraling triple-digit inflation and high borrowing costs, is starting to show signs of coming back to life under the pro-market reforms of libertarian President Javier Milei.】

item.title: Vanguard 英国客户在市场暴跌中面临获取服务的延迟
item.description: Vanguard公司周一表示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布加征关税后全球市场下滑，该公司的英国在线投资平台遇到了信息技术问题，客户在访问账户信息时面临延迟。【原文：Vanguard's UK online investment platform is experiencing IT problems with clients facing delays in accessing account information, the company said on Monday, as global markets slide following U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff announcements.】

item.title: 洞察力：美国公用事业公司努力应对大科技公司数据中心的巨大电力需求
item.description: 随着大科技公司在全国范围内寻找新数据中心的可行地点，以满足人工智能的计算需求，美国电力公司正在大量申请新的电力容量。【原文：U.S. electric utilities are fielding massive requests for new power capacity as Big Tech scours the country for viable locations for new data centers to keep up with the compute demands of AI.】

item.title: 软银将发行零售债券融资 41 亿美元
item.description: 日本科技投资集团软银集团（SoftBank Group）在周一提交的一份文件中表示，该集团计划通过向散户投资者发行债券融资 6000 亿日元（约合 41 亿美元）。【原文：Japanese technology investment group SoftBank Group plans to raise 600 billion yen ($4.10 billion) by issuing bonds to retail investors, it said in a filing on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普让新兴市场央行别无选择
item.description: 上周，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对新兴市场国家征收了令人震惊的关税，这给新兴市场国家的央行带来了新的难题，许多央行现在不得不在支持经济活动和保持脆弱货币稳定之间做出艰难的选择。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's bruising blast of tariffs last week has thrown emerging market central banks a fresh curve ball with many now forced to make the tough choice between supporting economic activity and keeping fragile currencies stable.】

item.title: 独家报道继特朗普之后，欧盟寻求印度对进口汽车征收零关税
item.description: 消息人士告诉路透社，欧盟希望印度在一项长期悬而未决的贸易协议中取消汽车进口关税，而印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的政府愿意在目前的提议基础上增加甜头，以完成谈判。【原文：The European Union wants India to eliminate tariffs on car imports under a long-pending trade deal and Prime Minister Narendra Modi's government is willing to sweeten its current proposal to seal the talks, sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 市场溃败加剧，期货暴跌，标普 500 指数逼近熊市区域
item.description: 美国股指期货周一大幅下挫，S&P 500指数似乎将确认进入熊市，投资者因担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全面关税计划会对经济造成影响而纷纷抛售政府债券。【原文：U.S. stock index futures plummeted on Monday, and the S&P 500 looked set to confirm a bear market, as investors barreled into government bonds on economic worries over the fallout of U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping tariff plans.】

item.title: 消息人士称，CATL 正在洽谈收购 Nio 电力部门的控股权
item.description: 四位知情人士告诉路透社，中国电池巨头 CATL 正在洽谈收购电动汽车制造商 Nio 动力部门的控股权。【原文：Chinese battery giant CATL is in talks to buy a controlling stake in electric vehicle maker Nio's power unit, which runs more than 3,000 battery swapping stations in China, four people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 报道称微软合资公司微创软件将停止中国业务并裁员
item.description: 据中国媒体《财经》周一援引消息人士的话报道，微软的合资企业微创软件将从周二起停止在中国的运营，此举将导致裁员约2000人。【原文：Microsoft's joint venture Wicresoft will cease its China operations from Tuesday, a move that will lead to the layoff of about 2,000 staff, Chinese media outlet Caijing reported on Monday, citing sources.】

item.title: 据媒体报道，德国在线经纪商 Trade Republic 因股价下跌而遭遇故障
item.description: 据德国媒体报道，由于全球股市大跌，德国在线经纪商 Trade Republic 周一遭遇故障。【原文：The German online broker Trade Republic suffered an outage on Monday as stocks fell in a global rout, German media reported.】

item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数期货有望确认熊市
item.description: 周一，标普 500 指数期货进一步下跌，与历史高点相比跌幅超过 20%，由于全球市场担心经济衰退，标普 500 指数有望确认进入熊市。【原文：Futures tied to the S&P 500 fell further on Monday and were down more than 20% from their all-time highs, putting the benchmark on course to confirm a bear market as recession fears hammered global markets.】

item.title: 股市下跌，非美国投资者对美元的需求激增
item.description: 在全球股市遭受猛烈抛售之后，货币市场周一开始出现紧张迹象，各种衡量美元需求的指标均创下几个月来的最高水平。【原文：Money markets on Monday began showing signs of strain following an aggressive selloff engulfing global equities, sending various measures of demand for dollars to their strongest in months.】

item.title: 独家报道德国默茨担心市场进一步崩溃，呼吁迅速采取关税行动
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布全面征收关税后，德国候任总理弗里德里希-默茨（Friedrich Merz）周一呼吁迅速采取行动，确保德国的竞争力，以应对股市和债券市场的下滑。【原文：Chancellor-in-waiting Friedrich Merz called on Monday for swift action to secure Germany's competitiveness in response to sliding stock and bond markets, following U.S. President Donald Trump's announcement of sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行和巴西开发银行利用巴西气候基金支持蒙巴重新造林
item.description: 植树造林初创公司Mombak周一表示，该公司与巴西桑坦德银行（Santander Brasil）和巴西开发银行（BNDES）达成了一项协议，获得了1亿雷亚尔（约合1780万美元）的资金，期待着碳清除市场的快速增长。【原文：Reforestation startup Mombak has secured 100 million reais ($17.8 million) in a deal with Santander Brasil and Brazilian development bank BNDES, it said on Monday, eyeing rapid growth in the carbon removal market.】
